summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4042 for the improvement of Ashworth Avenue, from a connection with the existing trunk sewer on West Green Lake Way to North 85th Street; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 48857, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
